4AIM.MI.summary: 4AIM SICAF S.p.A. is a private equity firm specializing in direct, secondary indirect and fund of fund investments. Within the direct investments, it specializes in emerging growth and growth capital. It also invests in small and medium sized companies. It does not invest in turnaround or restructuring investments. It prefers to invest in Italy. It seeks to exit its investments within 18 to 36 months. 4AIM SICAF S.p.A. is based Milan, in Italy.
